destinations.title: Paris, France
destinations.description: Paris, the City of Light, is famous for its romantic charm, world-class art, and historic landmarks.

destinations.title: Bali, Indonesia
destinations.description: Bali is a tropical paradise known for its beaches, temples, rice terraces, and spiritual culture.

destinations.title: Rome, Italy
destinations.description: Rome blends ancient ruins and Renaissance art with vibrant street life and Italian cuisine.

destinations.title: Cape Town, South Africa
destinations.description: Cape Town offers breathtaking scenery, coastal charm, historic landmarks, and outdoor adventures.
